author: Sawyer Vaughan

changelog.release_notes: Fix the text in the about page to Games for Pebble's proper name.

Removed chess and added solitaire to the original Pebbles. 
Added instructions for each game. 
Added a difficulty setting for chess. 
Fixed Solitaire bug. A user could add a card in the middle of the pile to the foundation at the top, which made the game unwinnable. 
Shows the Decrypt sequence after a win or a loss. 
Fixed numerous bugs in chess.
Support for Pebble Time Round. Have fun!

Solitaire is here! I hope you enjoy playing Solitaire on your Pebble Times.

I also fixed the win conditions for chess. The game will now handle it properly when you win.

A fix for improper naming of the app in last release. 

Enjoy Games for Pebble! Email me at sawyervaughan@gmail.com with comments, suggestions, or bugs.

This release is mainly a cleanup of the UI in the app. The menu is all-new and redesigned. Icons in the blackjack game no longer appear in inverted colors or as black squares. Support for Pebble Time is complete and fine-tuned. 

Enjoy! Email me at sawyervaughan@gmail.com with suggestions, bugs, or feedback.

Official color release. Pebble Time users can enjoy all of their favorite games in color! Pebble Time can also play Decrypt, a color code matching game!

In Decrypt, you are trying to decode the enemy's code. They have a code of six colors, and your goal is to guess what their code is. On each guess, the white dots will tell you how many colors you got right in the right space, and the black dots will tell you how many colors you have right, but in the wrong spot. 

Enjoy! Email sawyervaughan@gmail.com for comments, suggestions, or bugs.

2048 is here! Now you can combine numbers to your heart's desire! 

In anticipation of its coming release, Pebble Time users can now play Decrypt in PebbGames! I've also added color support for the rest of the games. 

This release also comes with many other bug fixes and improvements, such as:
 - Edited the size of chess to make it more easily viewable
 - Refactored tennis in order to have enough space for other games
 - Added support for Pebble Time. Added a win scenario for tennis
 - Increased high score available for food
 - Fixed a bug where Blackjack would not shuffle cards properly
 - Added a winning score to tennis, which fixed a bug where the score wouldn't display if it were ten or above

As always, enjoy! Email me at sawyervaughan@gmail.com with questions, comments, bugs or suggestions.

Blackjack has been added! Have fun!

As always, contact me at sawyervaughan@gmail.com with advice, bugs or otherwise.
Initial release of PebbGames! Initial games offering includes three games. Email me at sawyervaughan@gmail.com with game suggestions, bug discoveries, feedback and more. Have fun!

description: The best games app for Pebble, now in color with the Pebble Time! A collection of addicting games to waste a few minutes whenever you need to.
title: Games for Pebble
